channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Texas officials race to find survivors after devastating floods
item.description: At least 78 people are reported dead after flooding over the weekend. Meanwhile, residents are advised to be cautious over the next 24 to 48 hours as more rain threatens the area.
item.content:encoded:
At least 78 people are reported dead after flooding over the weekend. Meanwhile, residents are advised to be cautious over the next 24 to 48 hours as more rain threatens the area.

(Image credit: Ronaldo Schemidt)
item.dc:creator: Chandelis Duster

item.title: How good was the forecast? Texas officials and the National Weather Service disagree
item.description: As searchers continue to look for victims in the deadly flash flooding in Texas, officials are answering questions about the weather forecasts ahead of and during the storm.
item.content:encoded:
As searchers continue to look for victims in the deadly flash flooding in Texas, officials are answering questions about the weather forecasts ahead of and during the storm.

(Image credit: Eric Vryn)
item.dc:creator: Joe Hernandez

item.title: Video: Timelapse Shows Texas' Llano River Completely Flood in Just Minutes
item.description: Timelapse video shows authorities blocking off a low water crossing over the Llano River in Kingsland just before flash flooding completely inundated the area in just 10 minutes.
item.content:encoded:
Timelapse video shows authorities blocking off a low water crossing over the Llano River in Kingsland just before flash flooding completely inundated the area in just 10 minutes.

(Image credit: Robert Ivey)
item.dc:creator: NPR Staff

item.title: Musk forms new party after split with Trump over tax and spending bill
item.description: Musk said he's carrying out his threat to form a new political party after a falling out with Trump over the president's sweeping tax cuts law.
item.content:encoded:
Musk said he's carrying out his threat to form a new political party after a falling out with Trump over the president's sweeping tax cuts law.

(Image credit: Evan Vucci)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Knives, bullets and thieves: the quest for food in Gaza
item.description: NPR's Gaza producer faced Israeli military fire, private U.S. contractors pointing laser beams at his forehead and masked thieves as he tried to get food from a U.S.-supported group.
item.content:encoded:
NPR's Gaza producer faced Israeli military fire, private U.S. contractors pointing laser beams at his forehead and masked thieves as he tried to get food from a U.S.-supported group.

(Image credit: Eyad Baba)
item.dc:creator: Anas Baba

item.title: 4 things to know about the vaccine ingredient thimerosal
item.description: Advisers to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommended against flu shots containing the ingredient thimerosal. Why is the additive, safely used since the 1930s, being questioned again?
item.content:encoded:
Advisers to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommended against flu shots containing the ingredient thimerosal. Why is the additive, safely used since the 1930s, being questioned again?

(Image credit: Marie D. De Jesus/Houston Chronicle/Hearst Newspapers)
item.dc:creator: Sydney Lupkin

item.title: Tropical Storm Chantal brings heavy rains into northeastern South Carolina
item.description: Tropical Storm Chantal grew in strength as it approached the southeast U.S. coast. It's forecasted to bring heavy rains to parts of the Carolinas on Sunday.
item.content:encoded:
Tropical Storm Chantal grew in strength as it approached the southeast U.S. coast. It's forecasted to bring heavy rains to parts of the Carolinas on Sunday.

(Image credit: NOAA)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Dalai Lama, a global symbol of Tibetan culture and resistance, turns 90
item.description: The Dalai Lama turned 90 on Sunday surrounded by thousands of followers, who thronged the Himalayan town of Dharamshala.
item.content:encoded:
The Dalai Lama turned 90 on Sunday surrounded by thousands of followers, who thronged the Himalayan town of Dharamshala.

(Image credit: Ashwini Bhatia)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Iran's supreme leader makes first public appearance since Iran-Israel war started
item.description: Iran' s Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei on Saturday made his first public appearance since the 12-day war between Israel and Iran began, attending a mourning ceremony on the eve of Ashoura.
item.content:encoded:
Iran' s Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei on Saturday made his first public appearance since the 12-day war between Israel and Iran began, attending a mourning ceremony on the eve of Ashoura.

(Image credit: Office of the Iranian Supreme Leader)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: At least 78 dead and dozens missing after catastrophic Texas flooding
item.description: At least 78 people are dead following flooding that slammed central Texas over the weekend, while a desperate search for 11 missing from a camp for girls continues.
item.content:encoded:
At least 78 people are dead following flooding that slammed central Texas over the weekend, while a desperate search for 11 missing from a camp for girls continues.

(Image credit: RONALDO SCHEMIDT/AFP via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Sergio Martínez-Beltrán
